title: The Day We Started Speaking
content: The day our story began. The day I decided to message you on Instagram and just hope for the best. From that first message, I knew there was something special about you.

title: Our first call
content: After talking for days on text and messaging, we finally had our first call. It was so sudden and unexpected, when I heard your voice for the first time my heart skipped a beat. I was so nervous - I think this is the most nervous I've ever been with you and I was lost for words. It was such short call but that moment I felt connected to you in a different way. I didn't know what to expect but I noticed you had a slight Sri Lankan accent. After the call you told me you were so nervous too and we laughed about how you had an accent and that no one ever said that about you, everyone said your English sounded so posh.

title: We First Met
content: After a month of talking, we finally met in person. I was begging to see you even just for 5-10 minutes as I was so curious to put a face to the voice I had been talking to over the phone. I remember driving down to you from my house in Hemel Hempstead to see you whilst you were staying over at your uncle's house in Hounslow. I came in my silver Golf near the address you gave me, and I was a little nervous but excited to see you. I was driving down your road looking for you and messaging you to check where you were. I noticed a woman wearing black and I had a feeling that might be you, and cool, calm and collected opened my window and asked is that Thuvaraha. You were like yeah, so I parked up next to the kerb and opened the door from the inside and said jump in. The first time meeting you, I wanted to make this a special one so I got you white flowers to keep as a memory of us. The way we spoke everything felt so natural and easy. We were touching each others hands and i was caressing your knee, I never thought it would pan out this way. I even kissed you on the dorsum of you hand and your cheek even though I had embarrasingly asked you first. I didn't want to make you uncomfortable so I thought it would be courteous to ask first. We even took our first few photos of each other. Till this day from the moment I laid my eyes on you, I felt so at peace. I knew I had to make you mine.

title: First Date - Bowling & Our First Kiss
content: Our very first official long awaited date! I could finally take you somewhere to spend quality time and do an activity. I took you to Airport Bowling in Hounslow. I told you I was alright and not great at bowling, but by the end you felt like I cheated you and downplayed my skills. I was lowkey gassed how I did and it was so much fun. This was also the first time you drank alcohol. I decided to get a vodka and lemonade to loosen up a bit and you took a sip from my cup. We went to arcade after and played a bunch of random games, I loved seeing you play. I was beating you at every game but I think you eventually beat me at something... Basketball. I really need to work on that. After everything, we got in the car and were just chilling and talking together. The conversation was flowing so naturally, and I felt so comfortable with you. I kept looking at you, I couldn't take my eyes off you. We shared our ever first kiss that day. Everything around us faded away, and in that moment, it was just us. Time stood still... it was perfect. I will never forget that day.

title: Second Date in Croydon
content: Our second date taking you to Croydon for you to spend time with your friends at the Airbnb. I remember we were sitting in the back seat and I showed you videos of my brother's wedding and reception. That moment felt beautiful and I was so happy I turned my head to kiss you and we couldn't stop kising after that. Once it was getting pretty late, I didn't want to let you go. We got out of the car and hugged each other so tight. I spent the whole journey home thinking about us and how much I was falling for you.

title: 24 Hours Challenge
content: The 24-hour silence challenge you wanted to try. I was struggling so much with the urge to message you, but I didn't want to be the first to break. You expected me to cave, and so many thoughts were running through my head about whether I should just text you. Thankfully, I was working at Abbey's that day and it got super busy, plus I downloaded Whiteout Survival (yes, that game that's caused us so many petty arguments and laughs since then hehe). I even slept early to stop overthinking. When the challenge finally ended, I was so happy to hear from you again. It was worth it, but never again!

title: I Said I Love You
content: The day I finally told you I love you. We were both in the back seat of my VW Golf, just chilling together. I had brought my laptop from work since it was my work from home day. In the days leading up to this, we had been getting closer and closer, getting to know each other on a deeper level, and it felt like everything was falling into place. Sitting there with you, it finally felt like the right time. It wasn't a grand gesture or a dramatic moment - just us together in the simplest of settings. The world around us faded away, and I looked at you and said those three words that had been building up inside me: "I love you." It was a surreal moment, but I couldn't keep it in anymore. I knew way before how much you meant to me and how I felt about you. You mean everything to me, and I needed you to know.

title: She Said I Love You
content: The day you said those three magical words  to me. We were in the same setting as when I first told you - in the back seat of my VW Golf, just us together. I honestly never expected to hear it back so soon. I thought I'd be waiting weeks, months even, wondering if you felt the same way. But there you were, looking at me with those beautiful eyes, and you said "I love you." My heart exploded with happiness in that moment. I couldn't believe what I was hearing. All the thinking, all the waiting, it melted away instantly. Hearing you say 'I love you' was the best gift I could ever receive from you in that moment. It made everything real. You loved me back, and nothing else in the world mattered.

title: First Restaurant Date - Honeymoon
content: Our first proper restaurant date at Honeymoon. You came up with the idea to go to a restaurant together. I was so excited to go out and have a proper food date with you. The food was amazing, and the atmosphere was really nice. I was scared that someone I know might see us. there was nothing more beautiful than being across the table from you seeing your beautiful smile and eyes.

title: Our Most Intimate Moment
content: January 4th, 2025. The day we became intimate and became one. A moment of pure bliss, love, trust, and connection. We booked a hotel together to spend the night together. It brought us ever closer and shared an experience that will always be special. This memory is just for us.

title: Be My Valentine
content: The day I asked you to be my Valentine. I wanted to make it special, so I made you a handmade origami heart and wrote you a card asking you to be mine. I also got you beautiful flowers to show you how much you mean to me. When I gave it all to you, seeing your face light up made my heart skip a beat. And of course, you said yes! I couldn't wait to spend our first Valentine's Day together, making it a memory we'd cherish forever.

title: First Central Motive - PF Chang's
content: March 23rd, 2025. Our first adventure to central London together! PF Chang's for dinner - amazing food and even better company. I love exploring the city with you.

title: I Asked Her to Be My Girlfriend
content: April 20th, 2025. Six months after we first spoke, I officially asked you to be my girlfriend. The happiest 'yes' I've ever heard. You're mine, and I'm yours. Forever.

title: First Time With My Friends - Greenwood
content: May 25th, 2025. The first time you met and hung out with my friends at Greenwood. You fit in perfectly, and everyone loves you. Watching you laugh with my friends made me fall for you even more.

title: Shard Hutong Restaurant
content: September 1st, 2025. An incredible evening at Hutong in The Shard. The views, the food, the ambiance - but the best view was sitting across from you. One of our most special dates.

title: Came to Jupiter Drive
content: September 10th, 2025. A special day at Jupiter Drive. Another beautiful memory added to our collection. Every moment with you is worth remembering.
